segments.text: I'd like to buy a bottle of Centrum , a dozen tooth brushes , some baby's wipes , and a small bottle of aspirin .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Centrum ? We have bottles of thirty and one hundred tablets . Which kind do you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Give me one bottle of one hundred tablets .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And what kind of toothbrushes would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Can I have a look at them ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . This brand is supposed to be very good , but they're expensive . Those are new products . They come in several colors and sizes . There is also hard , soft , and medium .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This one is 10 % off . That one has no reduction , but you can get a free tube of toothpaste with six toothbrushes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So if I buy a dozen , I'll get two free tubes of toothpaste ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Good . I ' ll take a dozen of them then .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And here is your aspirin . What else did you say you want ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , actually I'd like to buy some vitamins for my son . He's five months old . Can you suggest any ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . Here you are . This one is excellent . Just mix one drop of it with milk .
segments.speaker: S2
